overview:
Patrice Breton is a successful serial entrepreneur. He was co-founder and Vice-President Emerging Technologies of â€œMediagrif Interactive Technologiesâ€, a publicly traded world leading developer and operator of business-to-business vertical maketplaces based in Montreal, Canada (TSX:MDF). Patrice was the original founder of Mediagrif and initiator of its first and most profitable B2B marketplace.

Patrice also founded and operates inVin Wine Solutions, a Montreal based company specializing in wine industry business applications including inVinSys, a white-label wine warehouse management system which offers both client and corporate-side inventory management functionalities; and Wine Price Exchange, an online service for serious wine enthusiasts and professionals which allows users to organize, appraise and source wine on a single platform.

Patrice also founded and operates a highly acclaimed small luxury winery (Vice Versa) in Napa Valley, California (www.viceversawine.com).
